title: Go Fly Drone Remote Controller
description: Elevate your drone uav or flycam experience with Go Fly Drone Remote Controller, the ultimate drone app designed to empower your UAV performance. Support 40+ UAV drone models (Android Mobile SDK 5.10) Go 4 is the most trusted drone app for DJI 3 new models such as: - 3 Pro / Mavic 3 / Mavic 3 Pro / Mini 3, RC N1, RC Plus / Pro, Mavic 3M, Mavic 3T - Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Smart Controller Enterprise, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Phantom 3 professional, O3 - Matrice 30 Series, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus or Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice - Zenmuse H20 Series / H30 Series, Zenmuse P1 / L1 / L2, Inspire 3 DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER FEATURES Offers intuitive drone controller, flight simulator, powerful fpv drone camera and seamless connectivity to unlock the full potential of your gofly drone / drone uav... through drone app: - Waypoint: Regardless of your skill level, Smart Flight for Fly Drone provides the most user-friendly yet robust tool for creating waypoint missions (compatible with Phantom series drones). - Panorama: Effortlessly capture 360-degree horizontal and vertical panoramas by drone camera. - Focus mode: Go Fly for simplifies control by managing the drone's yaw axis and gimbal, allowing you to focus on horizontal movements. - Smart Flight modes: Easy to remote control drone with flight modes to fly a drone with drone GPS navigation, compatible with all drone models, these modes enhance your drone flight experience. - On-screen Exposure graph: Monitor exposure levels with the on-screen exposure graph for precise control over your drone camera settings. - User-friendly interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface and drone camera view from phone for seamless drone control and navigation. - Expansive Drone camera view: Take control of your shots with customizable camera settings, allowing you to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance for the perfect capture - Simple exporting of images & videos: Easily save and transfer your high-resolution photos and videos directly to your phone for quick access and sharing. - Tutorials: Access tutorials to assist you in getting started & how to gofly drone uav & become pilot with ease, optimize UAV performance *Compatible with almost model with Android Mobile SDK 5.10: Mini 3 Pro, RC Plus, Smart Controller Enterprise, Mini 3, RC N1, RC Pro, Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Mavic 3M, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice, Zenmuse H20 Series, Zenmuse H30 Series, Zenmuse P1, Zenmuse L1, Zenmuse L2, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus), Matrice 300 RTK (Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 30 Series, Zenmuse H30 With Mavic models, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down. DISCLAIMER: This app is neither an official DJI product nor affiliated with the DJI company.
descriptionHTML:
Elevate your drone uav or flycam experience with Go Fly Drone Remote Controller, the ultimate drone app designed to empower your UAV performance.

Support 40+ UAV drone models (Android Mobile SDK 5.10)
Go 4 is the most trusted drone app for DJI 3 new models such as:
- 3 Pro / Mavic 3 / Mavic 3 Pro / Mini 3, RC N1, RC Plus / Pro, Mavic 3M, Mavic 3T
- Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Smart Controller Enterprise, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Phantom 3 professional, O3
- Matrice 30 Series, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus or Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice
- Zenmuse H20 Series / H30 Series, Zenmuse P1 / L1 / L2, Inspire 3

DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER FEATURES
Offers intuitive drone controller, flight simulator, powerful fpv drone camera and seamless connectivity to unlock the full potential of your gofly drone / drone uav... through drone app:

- Waypoint: Regardless of your skill level, Smart Flight for Fly Drone provides the most user-friendly yet robust tool for creating waypoint missions (compatible with Phantom series drones).

- Panorama: Effortlessly capture 360-degree horizontal and vertical panoramas by drone camera.

- Focus mode: Go Fly for simplifies control by managing the drone's yaw axis and gimbal, allowing you to focus on horizontal movements.

- Smart Flight modes: Easy to remote control drone with flight modes to fly a drone with drone GPS navigation, compatible with all drone models, these modes enhance your drone flight experience.

- On-screen Exposure graph: Monitor exposure levels with the on-screen exposure graph for precise control over your drone camera settings.

- User-friendly interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface and drone camera view from phone for seamless drone control and navigation.

- Expansive Drone camera view: Take control of your shots with customizable camera settings, allowing you to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance for the perfect capture

- Simple exporting of images & videos: Easily save and transfer your high-resolution photos and videos directly to your phone for quick access and sharing.

- Tutorials: Access tutorials to assist you in getting started & how to gofly drone uav & become pilot with ease, optimize UAV performance

*Compatible with almost model with Android Mobile SDK 5.10: Mini 3 Pro, RC Plus, Smart Controller Enterprise, Mini 3, RC N1, RC Pro, Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Mavic 3M, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice, Zenmuse H20 Series, Zenmuse H30 Series, Zenmuse P1, Zenmuse L1, Zenmuse L2, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus), Matrice 300 RTK (Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 30 Series, Zenmuse H30

With Mavic models, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down.

DISCLAIMER:
This app is neither an official DJI product nor affiliated with the DJI company.
